dict.acceptation: 社会；上流社会；社团；社群；

sent.orig: Western society is civil society while eastern society is patriarchal society.
sent.trans: 西方社会是市民社会，东方社会是宗法社会。

sent.orig: With the development and prevalence of computer technology, society shifts from industrial society to informative society.
sent.trans: 随着计算机技术的快速发展和普及，人类社会正从工业社会开始进入信息社会。

sent.orig: After passed agricultural society, industry society, the human society is striding into the knowledge economy age.
sent.trans: 人类社会在经历了农业经济、工业经济形态之后，正在大踏步地跨进知识经济时代。

sent.orig: Transient Society unstable social state, is an intergradation to Transmigrant Society from Native Local Society.
sent.trans: 从移民社会的特征分析，东莞不是移民社会，倒彰显游民社会特征。

sent.orig: The slaves of the old society have become the masters of the new society.
sent.trans: 旧社会的奴隶变成了新社会的主人。
